runs.comm: back of length from middle towards off with some swing, defends to cover point
fuller and wider outside off, thick bottom edge towards short cover gives them one
touch back of length outside off, guides it to third man for one
back of length on middle stump, he makes some room and guides it late past point. Some good team work in the deep saves one
makes room and slices the full ball outside off to third man with a thick outside edge
pretty accurate on middle stump, he cuts it late to third man, and dangerously, for one
full delivery on off, driven straight to cover
nice yorker right on the off stump, he digs it out to cover again
full on middle and leg, he slogs it down to mid-on for a quick single
what a shot from Barresi! He saw the overpitched delivery and drove it straight and high over the bowler's head, and into the sight screen for a six!
back of length offcutter outside off, slices it to third man for one
slow and swinging into the pads, he doesn't get room to put it away but manages a leg bye
bowled him! Myburgh made room to target the off side but managed a bottom edge onto his leg stump for the back of length delivery
on the hips and it's tucked straight to short fine leg
Cooper gets off the mark by driving the length delivery into the covers
shuffles across to off a long way, it's a slower delivery down leg for a wide
big appeal for the slower offcutter that comes in and hits in front of middle stump, just above the knee roll. Not out given
Barresi also makes room and manages a bottom edge for the short of length ball on off, it goes back to the bowler
short ball outside off, he tries to get on top of it but pulls to deep midwicket for two
full outside off, pushed into the covers for one
short and wide, and Barresi crashes that with the square cut wide of point and that races to the boundary

just clears mid-on and goes for four! It was a slower delivery on off on length, Barresi went down the ground but didn't time it that well. Somehow he got enough to send that just over the running fielder from mid on

appeal for stumping, slower ball again. Barresi was through with his shot as he looked to pull on leg, he went outside the crease at the end of his shot but got his bat back just in time before the bails were taken off
short and wide now, lots of room and he launches that over the covers, high and far for a one-bounce four
very good yorker on leg stump, digs it down to mid on for one
in the block hole just outside off, can't get it away
wider outside off from back of length, he looks to smash it square but misses again
gets an inside edge back down to the bowler
makes room for the full delivery on off and crashes that with a grounded drive and it goes through cover for four! Costly misfield
shuffles to off now and drives the full ball just outside off to long on for one
in the block hole outside off, Cooper looks to block but misses
makes room to drive the low full toss to cover

dropped at deep square leg even though it was a very tough chance. Barresi whipped the ball to the leg side in the air and Munsey ran forward to catch that with a forward dive but couldn't hold on to it
dropped again, this was easy peasy! Barresi cleared his front foot and mistimes the bal for an easy catch that was ballooning towards cover. It popped out our Leask's hands
in the block hole and Barresi blocks on the leg side
short ball coming in and this time he clears the boundary! He turned on his back foot and slammed it over deep backward square leg for a six!
length delivery on off, pushed down to long-off for one
on length outside off and it's reverse swept to third man for two
comes forward and pushes the ball to cover
shuffles to off, tries to whack the full ball to leg but it goes down leg for a wide
dances down and firmly drives this fullish ball to long off
almost carried back to the bowler as Cooper nearly chipped it back
sweeps the ball with the turn to short fine leg
fullish on off and middle, flicked to deep midwicket for two
pretty full again, driven down the ground just past the bowler and umpire for one
opens up and slams this ball with the turn to the square leg boundary for a six. Just cleared the fielders in the deep
dances down and lofts this high and straight towards the sightscreen on the off side for six more
turning in sharply from back of length, worked to deep midwicket
full and down leg for a wide, deflects off the keepr to short fine leg
cuts the ball firmly to deep cover off the back foot
slightly slow on middle and leg, he defends it back
reverse slogs the full toss on off to the third man boundary for a one-bounce four
length ball is pushed back to the bowler
comes down the track to make it a low full toss and drives it nicely through the covers for four more
works the ball off the pads towards deep midwicket and quickly comes back for two
on middle and leg again, steered to deep midwicket again
fullish delivery on off stump is reverse-steered to cover point for a quick single
makes room to whip to leg, but takes the incoming ball on his body
shuffles across, gets a short ball and hammers that over the square leg boundary for six
makes some room and drives it nicely inside out, into the gap over the covers for a one-bounce four
inside edge rolls back to the bowler after hitting the pad
slower offcutter going away from outside off, slammed to deep cover point for one
no more drops, no more stumping chances, he's bowled this time! He went all across the line of the stumps, exposed them and missed the ball which hit the base of off and middle stumps
full and wide outside off, he drives hard and a thick outside edge flies just past the diving keeper for four
drives this one firmly into the covers for one
Evans gets another! Touch back of length and angling away from just outside off, Cooper pushes at it and gets a thin outside edge
turning into middle and leg, he leans forward and defends towards square leg
comes forward and helps the ball with the spin to square leg for a quick one
fullish on off, swept to deep square leg for one
turns down the leg side now, not given a wide. Maybe some bat or pad
slower length delivery on off, steered to square leg for one
short of length ball around off, it's turned off the back foot straight to midwicket
bit of flight on off, turned to leg for one
reverse swept on off, gets a thin edge and the keeper loses balance while trying to stop with his left hand
fullish outside off and it's driven firmly into the covers
length delivery is pushed into the covers for a quick single
slow, short and wide outside off, slammed to deep cover for one
bit of flight on middle leg, tucked to midwicket for one
lofted with the turn towards wide long on for one
flighted and full around off, RVDM goes down on a knee and slog-sweeps it over deep midwicket for six
flighted outside off again, driven straight to cover
little shorter outside off, punched off the back foot to deep cover
comes down and pushes the ball with the turn to long on for one
right in the block hole on middle, he blocks it back
back of length and coming in, he helps it to the off side behind square for one
attempted yorker on leg stump is tucked to short fine leg for a quick single
cross-batted heave from Borren launches the incoming ball to the midwicket boundary for a cracking four
on the leg side again, this time behind square as he puts his front foot across and puts it away with the angle for a six now!
fuller around off, driven down to long on for one
waist-high full toss is heaved behind square on leg for two
in the block hole on off and it's steered down to long on for one
slower bouncer, very clever ball as van der Merwe looks to scoop it over the keeper but doesn't connect
full toss on off is slammed down to long off for one
makes a lot of room, Davey pitches it wide and Borren gets a thick edge rolling away to third man for four
right in the block hole on off, he blocks it back
full delivery on off, driven down to long off for one
leans across towards off and sweeps that to fine leg in the air for one
in the block hole again for van der Merwe, driven into the covers
another slog-sweep, another six even though it looked like a top edge. But he hit that with enough power to beat the fielder in the deep
similar ball, similar shot and same result - six! He went finer this time with the shot and got six again
wider outside off and it's reverse swept to the third man region now. Coetzer chases and slides but can't keep it inside
full on leg, driven down firmly to long on
slow and low full toss around off, Borrn slams that through the covers after making room and gets four
yorker on leg stump, pushes it down to long on for one
slow and low outside off again, he unleashes a drive again
fullish on off, RVDM slogs it on the leg side with a big swing and a spectator catches that while almost sitting in the crowd
targets the block hole outside off and it's steered to cover point for one
back of length on off, struck hard to deep midwicket
slow and low full toss outside off, he sweeps it right at the end towards square leg
bottom of middle stump! It was in the block hole, ROFL slogged and missed it and the ball crashed into middle stump
block hole again, digs it down to long on this time
slow and short offcutter coming in, he waits and them guides it just over the jumping keeper
pretty full around off, slogged to the leg side and he's taken at deep midwicket. He did his job, tough with that scintillating fifty
slower full toss on leg, steered to deep midwicket for one
yorker again and it's driven to cover
pretty full on middle and it's driven after making room to deep cover point
turns on his back foot completely for the slower short ball and lofts it over short fine leg for one
drives this one from off stump to cover for one
almost in the block hole, drills it down the ground for two to cross 190
